text: Madame Margaret LaFolier House, also known as the Ludwig House, was a historic home located near Huntington in Huntington County, Indiana. It was built in the 1830s, and was a two-story, Greek Revival style frame dwelling. Note: This includes and Accompanying photographs. It has been demolished. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1982 and delisted in 1990. ==References== Category:Former National Register of Historic Places in Indiana Category:National Register of Historic Places in Huntington County, Indiana Category:Greek Revival houses in Indiana Category:Houses completed in 1830 Category:Houses in Huntington County, Indiana Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in Indiana
title: Madame Margaret LaFolier House
